course.subject: FINA
course.name: Green Finance and Capital Markets
course.description: This course covers the sustainable and green financing with a focus on offshore debt capital markets in China and Hong Kong. Different green financing instruments, how green elements are considered and factored in corporate credit rating and green assessments, and the major green external review approaches are detailed and explained. This course will empower the students with the most updated knowledge, market trends and direct first-hand cases (rather than the public domain) in the green finance and capital market fields.
